document.heading: MOUNT VERNON TRIANGLE BID AMENDMENT ACT OF 2006

history.narrative: Law 16-246, the “Mount Vernon Triangle BID Amendment Act of 2006”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-937, which was referred to Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 14, 2006, and December 5, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 28 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-602 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-246 became effective on March 8, 2007.
